thread.title: James and Janette McCaffrey
thread.title_full: TrustedHousesitters reviewed by James and Janette McCaffrey

author: James and Janette McCaffrey
title: James and Janette McCaffrey
text: The site is very easy to use and navigate around. Applications come thick and fast and are managed via the Web site by simple filters. We have been very happy with the support offered by the site. All in all joining Trusted housesitters.com has taken away the worry of pet care and home security when we are away from home.
